value.title: Azure fundamentals learning path
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of Azure cloud computing.

topItems.title: Cloud Concepts - Principles of cloud computing
topItems.excerpt: Explore the core concepts and benefits of cloud computing as you learn how to choose a cloud deployment model customized for your organization.

topItems.title: Create an Azure account
topItems.excerpt: Find out how to start using Azure by creating an account where you’ll see services and personal settings for identity, billing, and preferences.

topItems.title: Core Cloud Services - Introduction to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Create your first virtual machine as you discover the power of Azure cloud computing and storage, along with services that help you explore new software paradigms.

topItems.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure architecture and service guarantees
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Azure global network of physical datacenters, the physical architecture of Azure, how redundancy is provided, and Microsoft service guarantees.

images.title: Cloud Concepts - Principles of cloud computing

value.title: Azure fundamentals
value.excerpt: Interested in the cloud, but aren't sure what it can do for you? This path is the place to start.

value.title: Cloud Concepts - Principles of cloud computing
value.excerpt: Explore the core concepts and benefits of cloud computing as you learn how to choose a cloud deployment model customized for your organization.

value.title: Create an Azure account
value.excerpt: Find out how to start using Azure by creating an account where you’ll see services and personal settings for identity, billing, and preferences.

value.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Design your migration to Azure
value.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Migrate and Azure Database Migration Service.

value.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure compute options
value.excerpt: Explore essential Azure concepts to find out how virtual machines, containers, and apps combined with serverless computing services can fortify your business.

value.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure architecture and service guarantees
value.excerpt: Learn about the Azure global network of physical datacenters, the physical architecture of Azure, how redundancy is provided, and Microsoft service guarantees.

value.title: Implement resource management security in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to secure resources using policy, role-based access control, and other Azure services

topItems.title: Security, responsibility, and trust in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Discuss the basic concepts for protecting your infrastructure and data when you work in the cloud. Understand what responsibilities are yours and what Azure takes care of for you.

topItems.title: Apply and monitor infrastructure standards with Azure Policy
topItems.excerpt: Learn about tools Azure provides for policy and standards management that support your teams' ownership and development of their resources in the cloud.

topItems.title: Control and organize Azure resources with Azure Resource Manager
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Resource Manager to organize resources, enforce standards, and protect critical assets from deletion.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure’s role-based access control to effectively manage your team’s access to Azure resources.

images.title: Security, responsibility, and trust in Azure

value.title: Manage identity and access in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to work with subscriptions, users, and groups by configuring Microsoft Azure Active Directory for workloads.

value.title: Secure your cloud data in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: This learning path helps you leverage the built-in Azure services for securing app data, ensuring that only authorized services and clients have access.

topItems.excerpt: Discuss the basic concepts for protecting your infrastructure and data when you work in the cloud. Understand what responsibilities are yours and what Azure takes care of for you.

topItems.title: Top 5 security items to consider before pushing to production
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Site Reliability Engineering approach to the challenge of assuring reliability and gain a better understanding of why it matters.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to set up policies to classify, retain, and protect your cloud-based data.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Secure your cloud data
value.excerpt: Azure was designed for security and compliance. Learn how to leverage the built-in services to store your app data securely to ensure that only authorized services and clients have access to it.

value.title: Core Cloud Services - Manage services with the Azure portal
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure cloud platform through the Azure portal, where you create and manage all of your Azure resources.

value.title: AZ-104: Prerequisites for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: If you're an IT Administrator that's new to Azure and need to prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator, this path is the place to start. Learn the basic Azure concepts you'll need to know as an Azure administrator.

topItems.title: Apply and monitor infrastructure standards with Azure Policy
topItems.excerpt: Learn about tools Azure provides for policy and standards management that support your teams' ownership and development of their resources in the cloud.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the decisions you make before creating a virtual machine, the options to create and manage the VM, and the extensions and services you use to manage your VM.

topItems.title: Fundamentals of computer networking
topItems.excerpt: You'll learn the fundamental principles of computer networking to prepare you for the Azure admin and developer learning paths.

topItems.excerpt: Explore the fundamentals of computer networking security and monitoring.

value.title: Store data in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: This learning path gets you started with the basics of storage management in Azure, Storage Account creation, and choices for data storage.

topItems.title: Choose a data storage approach in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how using Azure Storage, Azure SQL Database, and Azure Cosmos DB - or a combination of them - for your business scenario is the best way to get the most performant solution.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Discover ways to use an Azure Storage account to manage your data for billing, access, and storage location of your blobs, files, queues, and tables.

topItems.title: Connect an app to Azure Storage
topItems.excerpt: Create a simple application and add configuration, client library references, and code to connect it to Azure Storage.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Store data in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure provides a variety of ways to store data: unstructured, archival, relational, and more. Learn the basics of storage management in Azure, how to create a Storage Account, and how to choose the right model for the data you want to store in the cloud.

topItems.title: Choose a data storage approach in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how using Azure Storage, Azure SQL Database, and Azure Cosmos DB - or a combination of them - for your business scenario is the best way to get the most performant solution.

value.excerpt: Create your first virtual machine as you discover the power of Azure cloud computing and storage, along with services that help you explore new software paradigms.

value.excerpt: Get acquainted with Azure networking basics to find out how Azure networking helps improve resiliency and reduce latency.

value.title: Get started with artificial intelligence on Azure
value.excerpt: Artificial Intelligence (AI) empowers amazing new solutions and experiences; and Microsoft Azure provides easy to use services to help you get started.

topItems.title: Get started with AI on Azure
topItems.excerpt: With AI, we can build solutions that seemed like science fiction a short time ago; enabling incredible advances in health care, financial management, environmental protection, and other areas to make a better world for everyone.

value.title: Get started with AI on Azure
value.excerpt: With AI, we can build solutions that seemed like science fiction a short time ago; enabling incredible advances in health care, financial management, environmental protection, and other areas to make a better world for everyone.

value.title: Predict costs and optimize spending for Azure
value.excerpt: Discover how to use Azure pricing calculator, Azure Cost Management, and Azure Advisor to predict and manage cloud expenses.

value.title: AZ-400: Facilitate communication and collaboration
value.excerpt:
Learn how DevOps capabilities such as continuous planning and continuous collaboration help you communicate deployment and release information with business stakeholders.
Take this learning path to help prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Analyze DevOps Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration
topItems.excerpt: Explore the first two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration.

topItems.title: Introduce the foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product
topItems.excerpt: DevOps is the union of people, process, and products to enable continuous delivery of value to our end users. Discover the first two foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product.

topItems.title: Characterize DevOps Continuous Collaboration and Continuous Improvement
topItems.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Collaboration and Continuous Improvement.

topItems.title: Explain DevOps Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality
topItems.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality.

images.title: Analyze DevOps Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration

value.title: DevOps dojo white belt foundations
value.excerpt: Familiarize yourself with DevOps basic concepts and principles.

topItems.title: Introduce the foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product
topItems.excerpt: DevOps is the union of people, process, and products to enable continuous delivery of value to our end users. Discover the first two foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product.

topItems.title: Define the foundation pillars of DevOps: Architecture and Technology
topItems.excerpt: There are three things required to make DevOps happen: the cultural component, tools and technology, and architecture. Discover the last two foundation pillars of DevOps, Architecture and Technology!
